Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 1612, the Flatside Wilderness  Additions Act, introduced by my colleague from Arkansas (Mr. Hill).

This bill would expand the boundaries of the Flatside Wilderness Area  in the Ouachita National…

…HILL of Arkansas. Mr. Speaker, I thank my good friend, Mr.  Westerman, and my colleagues in the House who serve on the Natural  Resources Committee for working with me on the Flatside Wilderness  Additions Act over the past 5 years.

I stand in strong support of H.R. 1612, which I think is a model for  how to go about considering recreation conservation…

Mr. WESTERMAN. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and pass the  bill (H.R. 1612) to designate the  Flatside-Bethune Wilderness in the Ouachita National Forest, and for  other purposes.
